title: S13 Ep27: The Sibold Effect: When Ghosts Come For You
itunes:title: The Sibold Effect: When Ghosts Come For You
description:
Fifteen years ago and while on a dive trip off the coast of Papua New Guinea, John David Miller purchased a piece of property in the Appalachian Mountains of Virginia he had never seen and knew nothing about. After closing and by chance, he discovered his motherâ€™s maiden name written on the bottom corner of the plat.

John David Miller started to put together the ghostly clues that led to an earth shattering archeological discovery linked to his own childhood and ancient past. The discovery also shows there are no coincidences, everything is connected, and everything happens for a reason. This is a true story!
